doc.repnme: Transcript of meeting of the Executive Directors of the IBRD and IDA, held on Tuesday, March 27, 1973 : Tanzania - Fourth Education Project
doc.abstracts: This partial transcript, from the session of the Executive Directors of the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD) and International Development Association (IDA) held on Tuesday, March 27, 1973 covers only the discussion on the Fourth Education Credit for Tanzania.
doc.docna: Transcript of meeting of the Executive Directors of the IBRD and IDA, held on Tuesday, March 27, 1973 : Tanzania - Fourth Education Project
